sense.def:
Kar je
official
, je potrdila vlada ali drug pristojen organ ali posameznik.

seg.quote: The official figures were published in January.
Arabic is the official language of Morocco.
...the official opening of the new bridge.
The war officially ended the following year.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
official
opisujemo stvari, ki jih naredijo ali uporabljajo ljudje na položajih, zlasti ko gre za zadeve, ki so del njihove službe ali uradnih dolžnosti.

Kadar je pojasnilo
official
, je neresnično, vendar ga nekdo ljudem da, ker je resnica neprijetna.

seg.quote: Visiting his aunt was only the official motive.
Officially she shares a flat with some girlfriend.

sense.def:
An official
je oseba na odgovornem položaju v kaki ustanovi.
